sentence.Network_en: Near Lieska , in Carelia, lives the sculptress Eva Ryynanen, an extraordinary artist who works with wood.
sentence.Network_cn: 在Lieska附近的Carelia, 居住着雕刻家evaRyynanen,一位杰出的木雕艺术家.

sentence.Network_en: Near Lieksa , lives the sculptress Eva Ryynanen, an extraordinary artist who works with wood.
sentence.Network_cn: 杰出的女木雕艺术家伊娃·莱南恩住在列克萨附近.

auth_sentence.content: She's a sculptress and an artist, and her husband, Kenny Schachter, is also an art dealer.
